comment: Adds a whitelist of packages that have known memory leaks

Sets the ASAN message to go to /va/log/asan${pid} by
default

Makes llvm not generate .cgprofile entries when we
do not use integrated-as
Used as destination of target generators
Fixes crbug/591436. Force fallback to traditional executable detection

Temporary workaround. Breakpad cannot handle Dwarf
Version 4. Works around issue by forcing Debug Frames
version of Dwarf to be version 1, while leaving the rest of
the Dwarf data at version 4

Fixes clang.elf calling clang.elf because direct
calls to clang.elf misses all environment setup in clang
wrapper. Calls to clang wrapper instead of clang.elf binary

Uses argv[0] to get host system information. Created
a wrapper of LLD and real lld becomes lld.elf so the LLD
cannot get the host system information and dies

Achieves the functionality of reordering .text.hot
sections before .text section
PR44268: Fix crash if __builtin_object_size is applied to a heap allocation
[ELF] Refine section group --gc-sections rules to not discard .debug_types
Revert "Reland: [DWARF] Allow cross-CU references of subprogram definitions"
Revert 651f07908a1 "[AArch64] Don't combine callee-save and local stack adjustment when optimizing for size"
Revert "[InstCombine] keep assumption before sinking calls"
Revert 3f91705ca54 "ARM-NEON: make type modifiers orthogonal and allow multiple modifiers."
[Diagnostic] Fixed add ftabstop to -Wmisleading-indentation
[LLD][ELF][ARM] Do not insert interworking thunks for non STT_FUNC symbols
Make llvm::crc32() work also for input sizes larger than 32 bits
[DebugInfo] Add another level to DebugInfoKind called Constructor
[PATCH][DebugInfo] Add option to clang to limit debug info that is emitted for classes
Add a warning, flags and pragmas to limit the number of pre-processor tokens in a translation unit
[DebugInfo] Re-instate LiveDebugVariables scope trimming
Revert "[msan] Check qsort input."
Revert Recommit "[GlobalOpt] Pass DTU to removeUnreachableBlocks instead of recomputing."
Revert "[DebugInfo][DAG] Distinguish different kinds of location indirection"
Fix StringRef std::string after 777180a32b6107.
